name: DLsite Scraper
description: DLsite metadata provider with backend scraper service
overview: Jellyfin DLsite metadata plugin, provides rich metadata and images for doujin content via backend service.

versions.changelog: Initial release: DLsite metadata scraping support with search by title or RJ/VJ ID, rich metadata including Japanese titles and voice actors, comprehensive image support, API token authentication, configurable logging, native Japanese content support, compatible with Jellyfin 10.10.7.
